name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Driven Senior React Native Developer with extensive experience in **JavaScript**, **React.js**, and **React Native** for web and mobile app development. Proven ability to create scalable, user-centric applications that enhance user experience and engagement. Highly skilled in integrating **Open Source** technologies and collaborating effectively within teams. Recognized for proactive problem-solving skills and a self-driven approach, continuously optimizing application performance and fostering a culture of communication and teamwork.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed mobile applications using **React Native**, ensuring a seamless user experience and optimized performance across platforms.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement web solutions leveraging **JavaScript**, enhancing overall application functionality and responsiveness by 30%.
Enhanced the user interface of mobile applications with **React.js**, improving user engagement by 25% through intuitive design.
Contributed to open-source projects, fostering community collaboration and demonstrating strong communication skills.
Provided proactive solutions to complex development challenges, reducing bug resolution time by 40% and improving code quality across development teams.
Utilized agile methodologies and led team meetings to ensure project milestones were met on time, demonstrating strong teamwork and leadership skills.
Implemented best practices for **mobile app development**, improving app performance by 20% and user retention rates.

• Developed web and mobile applications utilizing **React.js** and **React Native**, fostering a dynamic user experience and optimizing performance.
• Collaborated effectively in a team environment, demonstrating strong communication skills to enhance project outcomes.
• Implemented proactive strategies for code quality and project management, delivering features on schedule and exceeding expectations.
• Leveraged **JavaScript** to build reusable components and improve development productivity by **30%**.
• Engaged in open-source projects, providing contributions that increased community frameworks' efficiency.
• Successfully led a project that integrated critical user features, resulting in a **40%** increase in user engagement.

Focused on mobile app development using **React Native**, delivering seamless user experiences across platforms.
Contributed to web development with **JavaScript** and **React.js**, enhancing application functionality and interactivity.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, leveraging strong communication skills to ensure project alignment and timely delivery.
Played a proactive role in code reviews and knowledge sharing sessions, fostering an open-source culture within the team.
Implemented testing strategies, reducing bugs by 30% and improving release cycles by 20%.
Utilized version control systems, ensuring organized project management and team collaboration.

skills:

	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

 **Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

	Microservices, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, web development, mobile app development, Open Source, communication, team player, proactive, self-driven
